DOC.brief_summary: Drug elute stent significantly reduce rate in-stent restenosis coronary artery . There several kind DES i.e . elute drug either stable biodegradable polymer . The type polymer may impact clinical outcome . The aim study compare safety efficacy implantation two different type stent elute paclitaxel stable v biodegradable polymer ( TAXUS stent v LUC-CHOPIN stent ) coronary artery by-pass graft .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Safety Efficacy Two Different Drug Eluting Stents Implanted Into Saphenous Vein Grafts

Reference segment diameter range 2.54.5mm 1 . Cardiogenic shock 2 . Contraindications prolong dual antiplatelet therapy 3 . Female child birth potential unless effective contraception 4 . Other medical condition may limit survival
DOC.keyword: saphenous vein graft , TAXUS stent , Chopin stent
